name: Like Clay (itch)
description:
Your name is Jim Stevens.
Tom Kemer an ex fellow student is missing.
Tom has been struggling with life. He lost his job, his girlfriend and his home.
In the last text message that Tom has sent you, he mentioned that things were working out again. He found a new home and even made new friends.

After that there was no more connection. All of your messages and calls stayed unanswered.

You were getting worried and decided to take a couple of days off to look for him.

Like Clay is an adventure game with horror elements.

The focus of the game is on finding out what happened to your friend
by reading hints and listening to audio messages, finding hidden stuff, solving light puzzles and evading deadly foes and lethal traps.

REQUIREMENTS

OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10

Minimum
CPU: i5 3000 Series
Graphics Card: GeForce GTX 660
RAM: 4GB
Free Hard Disk Space: 2GB

Reccomended
CPU: i7 4000 Series
Graphics Card: GeForce GTX 780
RAM: 4GB or more
Free Hard Disk Space: 2GB
